author: tbilisi.andrew
title: Continuing in Georgia (country)
description: Georgia embraces blockchain technology to make every part of public life better, the problem is they do not have funds to implement this.
solution: It is best to fully fund pilot projects that are on-chain to demonstrate and then make true country wide change. Lets do two pilot projects.
experience: I managed the Baia's Wine/Cardano track/trace program. I advise the Georgian gov on tech issues and can place additional projects in gov.
